statements: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;

SELECT customer_id, phone_number, preferences FROM customers WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com%';

SELECT customer_name, phone_number, email_address FROM customers WHERE preferences->'$.category' = 'electronics';

SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email_address = 'example@email.com';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, purchase_history FROM customers WHERE preferences->'$.color' = 'blue';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number, purchase_history FROM customers WHERE purchase_history->'$.total_spent' > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, amount FROM purchase_history WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, amount FROM customers INNER JOIN purchase_history ON customers.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date FROM customers INNER JOIN purchase_history ON customers.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history WHERE product_name = 'Smartphone' ORDER BY amount DESC;

SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email_address LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT preference_name, preference_value FROM preferences ORDER BY preference_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchase_history USING (customer_id) WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;

SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT customer_name, preference_name FROM customers JOIN preferences ON customers.customer_id = preferences.customer_id
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchase_history ON customers.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT purchase_id, product_name, purchase_amount FROM PurchaseHistory ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, preference_type, preference_value FROM Preferences WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE campaign_type = 'Email';
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT preference_type, preference_value FROM Preferences WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, email, gender FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT category, preference_value FROM preferences WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT product_id, purchase_date, price FROM purchase_history WHERE customer_id = 200 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, email, age FROM customers WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY age ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category='Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 10000 ORDER BY start_date ASC

SELECT p.name AS product_name, c.name AS customer_name, ph.purchase_date FROM products p INNER JOIN purchase_history ph ON p.id = ph.product_id INNER JOIN customers c ON ph.customer_id = c.id WHERE ph.purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY ph.purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT p.category, COUNT(ph.id) AS num_purchases FROM products p LEFT JOIN purchase_history ph ON p.id = ph.product_id GROUP BY p.category HAVING num_purchases > 100 ORDER BY num_purchases DESC
